metadata.title: Sea-surface Height Satellite Imagery

creators.name: University of Alaska Fairbanks (UAF), School of Fisheries

metadata.description:
Sea surface height anomalies from satellite-borne altimeter.  
An NPMR project
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Data supporting NPMR project "Influence of mesoscale eddies on shelf-slope exchange." Identify instabilities Bering Slope Current.

Status: Planned

Maintenance frequency: As Needed

Access constraints: Requires Contributor's permission

Use constraints: Requires Contributor's permission
